# Space Law The charter of corporate rights grants the following rights to Nanotrasen Employees, in order of importance.
- 1. The right to follow corporate law. - 2. The right to work towards the greater wealth and prosperity of Nanotrasen. - 3. The right to respect oneâ€™s superiors in management and understand the hard work they accomplished to achieve their position. - 4. The right to a Nanotrasen appointed public defender. If no lawyer is currently available, then the security officer who arrested the employee will be appointed as their defender.
## Treatment Of Prisoners
The charter of corporate rights grants the following rights to Nanotrasen Prisoners, in order of importance.
- 1. The right to medical treatment. - 2. The right to communcations equipment, if not abused. - 3. The right to food and water. - 4. The right to their shift mandated PDA, unless tampered with; in which case a replacement will be issued. - 5. The right to freedom of movement within the designated brig.
## Security
The charter of corporate rights grants the following rights to Security Employees, in order of importance.
- 1. The right to search employees posessions on blue or higher alert, and to secure any contraband. - 2. The right to search employees suspected of a crime on any alert, and to secure any contraband. - 3. The right to check and remove any suspected illegal implants from crewmates suspected of possessing one. - 4. The right to implant any crewmate convicted of any crime with tracking and/or mindshield implants. - 5. The right to execute any crewmate refusing a mindshield implant. - 6. The right to waive brig time for corporal punishment, not exceeding critical condition.
## Sentencing
The charter of corporate rights grants the following rights to the Warden, Head of Security, and in their absense other security employees.
- 1. The right to sentence crewmates convicted of a crime for an appropriate time in the brig. - 2. The right to extend brig times for trouble caused. - 3. The right to use corporal punishment to retaliate against trouble caused. - 4. The right to the responsibility to preserve the life of all captured terrorists, magic users, and alien creatures for study at centcom.
